overview: Tex arrives on the Parker ranch on Christman eve and is given the job of being Santa Claus. Also dressed as Santa Claus, Blackie robs Parker and kills a man. When Tex is arrested for the murder, he escapes and joins up with outlaw Becker and his gang. He finds Blackie's Santa Claus suit but is soon made a prisoner.
tagline: RUSTLERS RUN FOR COVER...AS TEX'S SIX GUNS WHIP THE RANGE!
title: Down the Wyoming Trail
